controller

Class AbstractGameLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • controller.AbstractGameLoop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameLoop, java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class AbstractGameLoop
extends java.lang.Thread
implements GameLoop
    Implementation of GameLoop. A "clock" for the game. The GameLoop synchronizes model and view every frame.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread
